roles.err_name_not_provided: You must provide the role name category.
roles.err_role_mention_not_provided: You must ping the role, or type the role ID.
roles.err_role_mention_not_correct: Incorrect role ID specified, or the mention/ping was typed incorrectly.
roles.err_role_not_on_server: The specified role is not part of this server.

kcgmm.bad_game: The specified game is not correct.
kcgmm.no_type: The type of the map wasn't specified.
kcgmm.bad_type: Either an incorrect type of the map was specified, or the argument list doesn't match the custom map type.
kcgmm.no_id: The id of the map wasn't specified.
kcgmm.bad_id: The specified id of the map is not correct.
kcgmm.no_cw2_code_size: The size parameter of this CW2 code map wasn't specified.
kcgmm.bad_cw2_code_size: The size parameter of this CW2 code map is not correct.
kcgmm.no_cw2_code_complexity: The complexity parameter of this CW2 code map wasn't specified.
kcgmm.bad_cw2_code_complexity: The complexity parameter of this CW2 code map is not correct.
kcgmm.no_cw2_code_name: You must specify the name of the CW2 code map.

emotes.err_game_name_not_provided: You must provide the name of the game.
emotes.err_game_name_not_supported: %0 is not supported/not a valid game name.

experience.err_game_name_not_provided: You must provide the name of the game.
experience.err_game_name_not_supported: %0 is not supported/not a valid game name.
experience.err_user_mention_not_provided: You must ping the user, or type their user ID.
experience.err_user_mention_not_correct: Incorrect user ID specified, or the mention/ping was typed incorrectly.
experience.err_leaderboard_name_not_provided: You must provide the leaderboard name you wish to register with.
experience.intro_value:
Play maps and earn points, for fun!

`!exp register help` • Register
`!exp new help` • Play maps

`!exp profile` • Show profile
`!exp leaders` • Show leaderboards
experience.embed_instructions_value:
To claim experience and generate new maps to complete, call `!exp new [game]`
Maps that haven't been beaten on this round will have a chance to appear again.
experience.embed_results_title_2: Your new %0 __%1__ maps to beat are:
experience.embed_results_title_3: These selected maps you have beaten before. Hooray free experience!:
experience.embed_results_value:
To view your current progress, call `!exp profile %0`
Consider checking your progress before generating new maps.
To generate new maps to play, call `!exp new %0`
Maps that haven't been beaten on this round will have a chance to appear again.
experience.map_processing_error: Could not find map list data for %0. Try again later.
experience.not_registered:
You have to register first to do this. The registered name has to be the name you use on the leaderboards.

You can register with `!exp register %0 <name>`
experience.already_registered_with_this_name: You are already registered as `%0` for %1.
experience.already_registered_with_other_name: You are already registered as `%0` for %1. You cannot register again without erasing your progress. To wipe your progress, contact moderation.
experience.name_taken: The name `%0` is already taken for %1. If you feel this is a mistake, please contact moderation.
experience.register_confirm:
Are you sure you want to register with the name `%0` for %1? This has to be the name you use for the leaderboards. This name cannot be changed later without losing your progress.

Type the command again with your name to confirm, or use a different name to try again.
experience.register_success:
You are now registered as `%0` for %1. Have fun!

To get your first set of maps to complete, type `!exp new %2`

mapdata.err_game_name_not_provided: You must provide the name of the game.
mapdata.err_game_not_correct: The game you asked for is not a Knuckle Cracker game.
mapdata.err_mapid_invalid: The provided map ID is invalid.
mapdata.searching_map_cw2_add: For Creeper World 2, this might take a while. I'll need just a few minutes.
mapdata.search_result_too_fast: Could not find the requested map. If you're certain this map exists, try again in a few minutes.

stream.err_game_name_not_provided: You must provide the name of the game.
stream.err_game_name_not_supported: %0 is not supported/not a valid game name.
stream.err_role_name_not_provided: You must provide the id of the role to be mentioned whenever a stream of this game is running.
stream.err_role_name_not_correct: The specified role is not correct. Either mention the role or provide its id.
stream.err_role_name_not_on_this_server: The specified role is not part of this server.
stream.err_url_not_provided: You must provide a URL for your stream.
stream.err_url_bad: The provided URL is invalid. The URL must be a full Twitch or YouTube link.
stream.err_no_vod: Please provide a link to the VOD of the stream as a parameter. Alternatively write `override` as the parameter to not save a VOD.
stream.intro_value:
To subscribe to stream notifications, head to the self assigned roles channel. 
To be able to send stream announcements, you must be a %0
stream.channel_missing: The streaming channel is missing. Please add a channel first.
stream.channel_set: Streaming channel set. Future stream announcements will appear here.
stream.game_not_added: %0 is not a streamable game on this server.
stream.start_already_streaming: You are already streaming! Please end your current stream first.

competition.err_game_name_not_provided: You must provide the name of the game.
competition.err_game_name_not_supported: %0 is not supported/not a valid game name.
competition.err_leaderboard_name_not_provided: You must provide the leaderboard name you wish to register with.
competition.err_user_mention_not_provided: You must ping the user, or type their user ID.
competition.err_user_mention_not_correct: Incorrect user ID specified, or the mention/ping was typed incorrectly.
competition.competitor_role_no_setup: The competitor role has not been set up.
competition.competitor_role_missing: The competitor role was deleted from the server or cannot be found.
competition.already_registered_with_this_name: You are already registered as `%0` for %1.
competition.name_taken: The name `%0` is already taken for %1. If you feel this is a mistake, please contact moderation.
competition.register_name_changed: Your competition name has been changed from `%0` to `%1` for %2!
competition.register_success: Your competition name for %1 is now `%0`! Submit scores with this name and with `specialevent` as the group name and you will appear on the leaderboards.
competition.unregister_not_registered: This user is not registered for any game.
competition.unregister_success: The specified user is now no longer registered in %0 games.
competition.info_description:
Compete for the best score in numerous Particle Fleet, Creeper World 3, and Creeper World 2 maps. Your prize? Bragging rights... and points! Head over to the %0 channel and check the stickied messages for information on what maps we're currently competing in!

You're welcome to join any time. Simply head on over to the self assigned roles channel and become a Competitor there!

:warning:**Make sure to submit your scores with the `specialevent` Group name, or your score won't be included!**:warning:

Feel free to ask any questions you might have in %0.
competition.info_inactive: The competition is not active on this server. A competition channel needs to be set.
competition.end_date_in_past: The competition end time cannot be in the past.
competition.no_channel: The competition channel hasn't been set yet.
competition.channel_no_access: I can't reach the competition channel.
competition.start_message: A new competition is being started.
competition.competitor_role_missing:: A competitor role is not set up on this server, making it impossible to join or leave the competition.
competition.join_success:
Greetings Competitor! The next step is to register your leaderboard name.

```!c register pf yournamehere
!c register cw3 yournamehere
!c register cw2 yournamehere```
competition.leave_success:
You're no longer a Competitor. You can come back at any time using `!competition join`.

Future competitions will no longer show your name on the scoreboards. However, your points will not be lost, just not visible.
competition.addmap_not_started: A competition must be running first to add a map.
competition.removemap_not_added: The specified map has not been added to the current competition, meaning it is free to add.
competition.addmap_already_added: This map has already been added to the competition.
competition.addmap_already_in_history: This map has already been featured in a previous competition.
competition.cant_end_no_maps: The competition cannot end, as no maps have been added to it.

help: Show help for all commands available to you.

role: Associate a string with a role ID for usage with commands.
%space%<string> - An internal string ID for the role.
%space%<id> - The role mention/ping, or the role ID.

roll: %space%<sides> - The number of sides on the dice. If not specified, rolls a 6 sided dice.

bored: I wonder what game to play...

score: <v>%space%<type> - custom, dmd, code. If none is specified, assumes custom.
<v>%space%<objective> - CW4 only. The objective that must be completed.
<v>Show score for a CW2 code map.

map: Show information about a custom map.

bestof: Show the best maps of the month.

emote: Associate an emote with a KC game for use with various commands.

get: Get experience from completed maps and generate six new maps to beat.
show: Display information about your current profile.
register: Register your leaderboard name for the experience system.
%space%<name> - The name you use on the leaderboards.
wipe: Full wipe a user's experience data for a specific game.
%space%<id> - The user mention/ping, or the user ID.

setchannel: Set this channel as the one to broadcast stream announcements.
addgame: Associate a subscriber role with a Knuckle Cracker game. Users having this role by subscribing will be mentioned whenever a stream of said game goes live.
%space%<role> - Role ID, or mention the role.
end: %space%<vod> - The link to the VOD from your stream, or `override` to not save a VOD.
status: Check if anyone is currently streaming.

c: See the introduction to the Competition!
setchannel: Set this channel as the one for the Competition.
join: Join the Competition! You will receive a special Competitor role.
leave: Leave the Competition. You will lose your special Competitor role.
register: Register the user name you use on the in-game leaderboards for the specified game with your Discord profile.
%space%<name> - The exact name you use on the in-game leaderboards.
status: See the status of the current Competition.
start: %space%<date> - The end date for the competition, in any valid date format.
update: Update the scores manually. Scores are updated periodically.
destroy: Wipe the current Competition without saving any scores.
wipe: Wipe all Competition registration entries for the specified user.
%space%<id> - The user ID, or mention the user.
addmap: Add a map to the current Competition. See `!help score`
removemap: Remove a map from the current Competition. See `!help score`
buildtally: Rebuild the score tally. This action is also performed automatically after ending the Competition. This action will also update the roles of all Champions, if it was tampered with.
map: Get a random custom map from the specified game that was not featured in the Competition before.
